posts.title: Inside OpenAI’s in-house data agent
posts.summary: How OpenAI built an in-house AI data agent that uses GPT-5, Codex, and memory to reason over massive datasets and deliver reliable insights in minutes.

posts.title: Taisei Corporation shapes the next generation of talent with ChatGPT
posts.summary: Taisei Corporation uses ChatGPT Enterprise to support HR-led talent development and scale generative AI across its global construction business.

posts.title: Retiring GPT-4o, GPT-4.1, GPT-4.1 mini, and OpenAI o4-mini in ChatGPT
posts.summary: On February 13, 2026, alongside the previously announced retirement⁠ of GPT‑5 (Instant, Thinking, and Pro), we will retire GPT‑4o, GPT‑4.1, GPT‑4.1 mini, and OpenAI o4-mini from ChatGPT. In the API, there are no changes at this time.

posts.title: The next chapter for AI in the EU
posts.summary: OpenAI launches the EU Economic Blueprint 2.0 with new data, partnerships, and initiatives to accelerate AI adoption, skills, and growth across Europe.

posts.title: EMEA Youth & Wellbeing Grant
posts.summary: Apply for the EMEA Youth & Wellbeing Grant, a €500,000 program funding NGOs and researchers advancing youth safety and wellbeing in the age of AI.

posts.title: Keeping your data safe when an AI agent clicks a link
posts.summary: Learn how OpenAI protects user data when AI agents open links, preventing URL-based data exfiltration and prompt injection with built-in safeguards.

posts.title: PVH reimagines the future of fashion with OpenAI
posts.summary: PVH Corp., parent company of Calvin Klein and Tommy Hilfiger, is adopting ChatGPT Enterprise to bring AI into fashion design, supply chain, and consumer engagement.

posts.title: Introducing Prism
posts.summary: Prism is a free LaTeX-native workspace with GPT-5.2 built in, helping researchers write, collaborate, and reason in one place.

posts.title: Powering tax donations with AI powered personalized recommendations
posts.summary: TRUSTBANK partnered with Recursive to build Choice AI using OpenAI models, delivering personalized, conversational recommendations that simplify Furusato Nozei gift discovery. A multi-agent system helps donors navigate thousands of options and find gifts that match their preferences.

posts.title: How Indeed uses AI to help evolve the job search
posts.summary: Indeed’s CRO Maggie Hulce shares how AI is transforming job search, recruiting, and talent acquisition for employers and job seekers.

posts.title: Unrolling the Codex agent loop
posts.summary: A technical deep dive into the Codex agent loop, explaining how Codex CLI orchestrates models, tools, prompts, and performance using the Responses API.

posts.title: Scaling PostgreSQL to power 800 million ChatGPT users
posts.summary: An inside look at how OpenAI scaled PostgreSQL to millions of queries per second using replicas, caching, rate limiting, and workload isolation.

posts.title: Inside Praktika's conversational approach to language learning
posts.summary: How Praktika uses GPT-4.1 and GPT-5.2 to build adaptive AI tutors that personalize lessons, track progress, and help learners achieve real-world language fluency

posts.title: Inside GPT-5 for Work: How Businesses Use GPT-5
posts.summary: A data-driven report on how workers across industries use ChatGPT—covering adoption trends, top tasks, departmental patterns, and the future of AI at work.

posts.title: How Higgsfield turns simple ideas into cinematic social videos
posts.summary: Discover how Higgsfield gives creators cinematic, social-first video output from simple inputs using OpenAI GPT-4.1, GPT-5, and Sora 2.

posts.title: How countries can end the capability overhang
posts.summary: Our latest report reveals stark differences in advanced AI adoption across countries and outlines new initiatives to help nations capture productivity gains from AI.

posts.title: Introducing Edu for Countries
posts.summary: Edu for Countries is a new OpenAI initiative helping governments use AI to modernize education systems and build future-ready workforces.

posts.title: Horizon 1000: Advancing AI for primary healthcare
posts.summary: OpenAI and the Gates Foundation launch Horizon 1000, a $50M pilot advancing AI capabilities for healthcare in Africa. The initiative aims to reach 1,000 clinics by 2028.

posts.title: Stargate Community
posts.summary: Stargate Community plans detail a community-first approach to AI infrastructure, using locally tailored plans shaped by community input, energy needs, and workforce priorities.

posts.title: Cisco and OpenAI redefine enterprise engineering with AI agents
posts.summary: Cisco and OpenAI redefine enterprise engineering with Codex, an AI software agent embedded in workflows to speed builds, automate defect fixes, and enable AI-native development.
